title: Bad manners and bad mouthing
body: So basically, I've had a bad time in-game where I've fed, not intentionally just had a stroke of bad luck as people do sometimes. Along comes this guy who starts bad mouthing me in game. He then decided to add me after the match was over, and continued to keep constantly trying to insult me. Is there any way for this person to be punished? Maybe a chat ban so as he does not verbally abuse anyone else in game, as it does tend to bring some people down and can cause them to lash out as well.

replies.body: Why would you add him tho???? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Whenever i get added, i always check my 'recently played' list first. If its the person thats flaming all day, just reject it. Its actually funny how people cry about being abused when they already left the game. Completely their fault, flamer should be reported straight after game
If people like this don't get punished then i'm honestly done with this game, reports are a joke nobody fears them at all

The best part about when this happens (people adding you after game) is that their English is trash. Not to mention all they do is talk about incest, which leads you to believe that is all they think about.

The Boards are not the right place to report things like this
Also, can you please remove the name as there is a "[no naming and shaming policy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)" on the boards.

For cases like this, please send in a [support ticket to Riot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), detailing what happened as well as any evidence you may have (screenshots). Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.

If someone is bad mouthing you in game, it's a pretty safe bet they aren't adding you to say sorry, so I'd recommend against adding people like that, and if you do anyway, to remove them and block them as soon as this kind of thing starts.
